//: Set `killNow` to 1 to kill the process.
Pid will be null as soon as you save the file with `killNow: true`
Please add comments in this json file as key-value pairs only else the javascript won't be able yo read this json file thus you would not be able to kill the process.

//! If the backgroundProcessCommand [`tsc --watch`] is not actually running you can simply set isRunning to `false` and then re-run the `spm-initializer.js` program [INITIALIZER_SCRIPT] playwright tests to initialize background process again.
